Package HWSystem.Device.MotorDriver

Class SparkFunMD

java.lang.Object
HWSystem.Device.Device
HWSystem.Device.MotorDriver.MotorDriver
HWSystem.Device.MotorDriver.SparkFunMD
public class SparkFunMD extends MotorDriver
Represents the SparkFunMD motor driver device.

This motor driver communicates using the SPI protocol. It supports turning on/off the motor and setting its speed.

SparkFunMD is a type of MotorDriver and follows the same interface as other motor drivers in the system.

    • isProtocolCompatible

      public boolean isProtocolCompatible(Protocol protocol)
      Checks whether the given protocol is compatible with SparkFunMD. SparkFunMD only works with the SPI protocol.
      Specified by:
      isProtocolCompatible in class Device
      Parameters:
      protocol - the protocol to check
      Returns:
      true if the protocol is SPI, false otherwise
